title.narrative: Support to The Strategic Action Plan for Vocational Education and Training

description.narrative: The purpose of the project is to contribute to increased access and improved quality and equity of technical vocational education and training (TVET) and to build capacity for teacher education.

participating-org.narrative: Government Of Tanzania, United Republic of
STRATEGIC Action Plan for Vocational Education and Training Project
